allow:
Bash(bash -c '
source .claude/ralph.sh 2>/dev/null || true

# Test the fetch
curl -sf ""http://localhost:3000/docs-json"" > "".claude/execution/.swagger-cache.json"" 2>/dev/null
echo ""Cached $(jq "".paths | keys | length"" "".claude/execution/.swagger-cache.json"" 2>/dev/null || echo 0) endpoints""

# Test a few endpoints manually
echo """"
echo ""Testing endpoint detection:""
for endpoint in ""/api/v1/cart GET"" ""/api/v1/orders POST"" ""/api/v1/catalog/products GET""; do
    path=$(echo ""$endpoint"" | awk ""{print \$1}"")
    method=$(echo ""$endpoint"" | awk ""{print \$2}"" | tr ""[:upper:]"" ""[:lower:]"")
    
    if jq -e --arg path ""$path"" --arg method ""$method"" "".paths[\$path][\$method] != null"" "".claude/execution/.swagger-cache.json"" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo ""✓ FOUND: $method $path""
    else
        echo ""✗ NOT FOUND: $method $path""
    fi
done
')
